name: Braidy Industries, Inc.
description: Braidy Industries, Inc. is a technologically advanced aluminum manufacturing company dedicated to revolutionizing the automotive and aerospace sectors. Founded in 2017, Braidy aims to produce high-quality, lightweight aluminum products that enhance vehicle fuel efficiency and performance while reducing greenhouse gas emissions. The company operates a state-of-the-art aluminum rolling mill located in Ashland, Kentucky, which utilizes cutting-edge manufacturing techniques to produce a variety of aluminum sheets and plates for both commercial and military applications. Braidy is committed to sustainability and innovation, leveraging advanced technologies to create aluminum products that meet the stringent requirements of the automotive industry while also being environmentally friendly. By focusing on precision engineering and advanced materials, Braidy seeks to establish itself as a leader in the global aluminum market, aiming to supply major automotive manufacturers with the materials necessary for the next generation of vehicles. The company is driven by a mission to support U.S. manufacturing and create jobs in the local community, contributing to the revitalization of American industry.

seo.meta_title: Braidy Industries, Inc. | Advanced Aluminum Manufacturing
seo.meta_description: Braidy Industries, Inc. is at the forefront of aluminum manufacturing, providing lightweight, high-quality aluminum products for automotive and aerospace industries. Discover our commitment to innovation and sustainability.

faq.question: What does Braidy Industries specialize in?
faq.answer: Braidy Industries specializes in advanced aluminum manufacturing for the automotive and aerospace sectors.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Braidy Industries?
faq.answer: Craig Bouchard is the CEO of Braidy Industries, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Braidy Industries headquartered?
faq.answer: Braidy Industries is headquartered in Ashland, Kentucky, USA.

faq.question: What products does Braidy Industries offer?
faq.answer: Braidy Industries offers aluminum sheets and plates primarily for automotive and aerospace applications.
